posts.post_content:
This card scares me. 2 CMC for non-land permanents to enter tapped? ( Let's be honest, when was the last time you cared whether an enchantment or planeswalker was tapped? )  
  
And while people are saying this hoses Boros, why would you play Boros and NOT run this card? All your little hasters will face fewer blockers.

posts.post_content:
A perfect addition to any extort deck, Orzhov deck or any one with [Ethereal Armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ethereal Armor) since it affords you extra chances to attack without worry and enchantment +1/+1's. Use [Gift of Orzhova](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gift of Orzhova) too, cause i said so. Oh, and don't forget [One-thousand Lashes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=One-thousand Lashes) for more lockdown.  
  
Love this card, the cost, the name, the extort, the card type and the art... 5/5 for sure.  
  
Whoa aggro decks, we like to take it slow(or just faster than you). :P
